p: In the present specification, -(Y 3) ta- is preferably, for example, -S-(divalent C1-3 aliphatic hydrocarbon group which may have a substituent(s))-, -O-(divalent C1-3 aliphatic hydrocarbon group which may have a substituent(s))- or a divalent C1-4 aliphatic hydrocarbon group which may have a substituent(s), more preferably, for example, -O-(a divalent C1-3 aliphatic hydrocarbon group which may have a substituent(s))- or a divalent C1-4 aliphatic hydrocarbon group which may have a substituent(s), and most preferably a divalent C1-4 aliphatic hydrocarbon group which may have a substituent(s).
